Class ec.e.quake.Revive 

java.lang.Object

   +----ec.e.quake.Revive
public class Revive
extends Object
Used to revive a Vat from an earlier checkpoint

Revive()

main(String[])
To restart a Vat, do "java ec.e.quake.Revive filename", where filename is the same name that was provided in a "checkpoint=filename" property of an earlier EBoot command.

Revive 
  public Revive()

main 
  public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException, OnceOnlyException
To restart a Vat, do "java ec.e.quake.Revive filename", where filename is the same name that was provided in a "checkpoint=filename" property of an earlier EBoot command.

If a filename is provided, it is also used as the new "checkpoint=filename" property. If no filename is provided, then the filename bound to this property is used.
